Live testing while authoring

Presentation, video, and technical specification for live accessibility testing during editing.

This feature adds live accessibility checks inside the editor while publishing. It inspects the content and supports authors with help text and easy-to-understand remediation suggestions. The checks can run automatically or be triggered by the author.
